News.headline: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Whitehawk FC
News.page_title: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Whitehawk FC
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Whitehawk FC
News.short_description: Joe White has joined Whitehawk FC on loan until the .......
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that forward Joe White has signed a ...... loan with National League South club Whitehawk FC until ........

The forward signed his first professional contract with the Daggers at the start of January and has made two appearances for the Daggers both coming from the bench.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Shepherd is doing on his loan spell at Whitehawk FC.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
